Question: Shenzhen Ruishizhixin Technology co., ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Ruishizhixin Technology Co., Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Highlight

- Shenzhen-based company showcased leading tech products at CES 2024
- Unveiled latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies
- Featured products included semiconductor chips, integrated circuits for digital video, optical sensors, and camera with a linear image sensor
- Also presented downloadable computer software and application software for digital image processing and vehicle location detection system
- Exhibited electronic apparatus, such as motion detectors
- The company is committed to developing sensors for smart mobility and automation
- Demonstrated LiDAR sensor for ADAS & autonomous driving, robotics, and machinery applications
- Also showcased high-precision positioning products including Integrated Navigation System (P-Box), Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), and High-Precision GNSS Positioning Module
